verses.verse: In the tenth <WH6224> year <WH8141>, in the tenth <WH6224> month <WH8147>, in the twelfth day of the month <WH2320>, the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> against Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and prophesy <WH5012> against him <WH4714>, and against all Egypt;

speak <WH1696>, and say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Behold <WH6547>, I am against thee, Pharaoh king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, the great <WH1419> monster <WH8577> that lieth <WH7257> in the midst <WH8432> of his rivers <WH2975>, that hath said <WH559>, My river <WH2975> is mine own <WH6213>, and I have made it for myself.

And I will put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> in thy jaws <WH3895>, and I will cause the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers <WH2975> to stick <WH1692> unto thy scales <WH7193>; and I will bring thee up <WH5927> out of the midst <WH8432> of thy rivers <WH2975>, with all the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers <WH2975> which stick <WH1692> unto thy scales <WH7193>.

And I will cast <WH5203> thee forth into the wilderness <WH4057>, thee and all the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers <WH2975>: thou shalt fall <WH5307> upon the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>; thou shalt not be brought together <WH622>, nor gathered <WH6908>; I have given <WH5414> thee for food <WH402> to the beasts <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> and to the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>.
And all the inhabitants <WH3427> of Egypt <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, because they have been a staff <WH4938> of reed <WH7070> to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

When they took hold <WH8610> of thee by thy hand <WH3709>, thou didst break <WH7533>, and didst rend <WH1234> all their shoulders <WH3802>; and when they leaned <WH8172> upon thee <WH7665>, thou brakest, and madest all their loins <WH4975> to be at a stand <WH5976>.
Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Behold <WH935>, I will bring a sword <WH2719> upon thee <WH3772>, and will cut off from thee man <WH120> and beast <WH929>.

And the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be a desolation <WH8077> and a waste <WH2723>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>. Because he hath said <WH559>, The river <WH2975> is mine <WH6213>, and I have made it;

therefore <WH2975>, behold, I am against thee, and against thy rivers, and I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> an utter <WH2721> waste <WH2723> and desolation <WH8077>, from the tower <WH4024> of Seveneh <WH5482> even unto the border <WH1366> of Ethiopia <WH3568>.
No foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> shall pass through <WH5674> it <WH7272>, nor foot of beast <WH929> shall pass through <WH5674> it <WH3427>, neither shall it be inhabited forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.

And I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> a desolation <WH8077> in the midst <WH8432> of the countries <WH776> that are desolate <WH8074>; and her cities <WH5892> among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> that are laid waste <WH2717> shall be a desolation <WH8077> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>; and I will scatter <WH6327> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations <WH1471>, and will disperse <WH2219> them through the countries <WH776>.

For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: At the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> years <WH8141> will I gather <WH6908> the Egyptians <WH4714> from the peoples <WH5971> whither they were scattered <WH6327>;

and I will bring back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Egypt <WH4714>, and will cause them to return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of Pathros <WH6624>, into the land <WH776> of their birth <WH4351>; and they shall be there a base <WH8217> kingdom <WH4467>.

It shall be the basest <WH8217> of the kingdoms <WH4467>; neither shall it any more lift itself up above <WH5375> the nations <WH1471>: and I will diminish <WH4591> them <WH7287>, that they shall no more rule over the nations <WH1471>.

And it shall be no more the confidence <WH4009> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to remembrance <WH2142>, when they turn to look <WH6437> after <WH310> them <WH3045>: and they shall know that I am the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.

And it came to pass in the seven <WH7651> and twentieth <WH6242> year <WH8141>, in the first <WH7223> month <WH259>, in the first day of the month <WH2320>, the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> caused <WH5647> his army <WH2428> to serve <WH5647> a great <WH1419> service <WH5656> against Tyre <WH6865>: every head <WH7218> was made bald <WH7139>, and every shoulder <WH3802> was worn <WH4803>; yet had he no wages <WH7939>, nor his army <WH2428>, from Tyre <WH6865>, for the service <WH5656> that he had served against it <WH5647>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: Behold <WH5414>, I will give the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>; and he shall carry <WH5375> off her multitude <WH1995>, and take <WH5375> her spoil <WH7998>, and take <WH7997> her prey <WH957>; and it shall be the wages <WH7939> for his army <WH2428>.

I have given <WH5414> him the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> as his recompense <WH6468> for which he served <WH5647>, because they wrought <WH6213> for me <WH5002>, saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.

In that day <WH3117> will I cause <WH6779> a horn <WH7161> to bud forth <WH6779> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, and I will give <WH5414> thee the opening <WH6610> of the mouth <WH6310> in the midst <WH8432> of them <WH3045>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
